L

login(String, String) - Method in class controllers.LoginController
Upon posting to the /login URL with parameters email and password, this function login is called.
login(String, String) - Method in class dao.UserDAO
checks if the email exists within the User table, if it does, it then checks the hash of the submitted password concat with the salt.
LoginController - Class in controllers
This RestController class shall be associated with validating a user's login.
LoginController() - Constructor for class controllers.LoginController
Constructor creates its own instance of the LoginService required to validate a user's credentials.
LoginControllerTest - Class in controllers
 
LoginControllerTest() - Constructor for class controllers.LoginControllerTest
 
LoginIntegrationTest - Class in controllers
 
LoginIntegrationTest() - Constructor for class controllers.LoginIntegrationTest
 
LoginResponse - Class in model
 
LoginResponse() - Constructor for class model.LoginResponse
 
LoginService - Class in services
Service class fulfilling the business logic required to validate a login.
LoginService() - Constructor for class services.LoginService
This class makes us of the UserDAO, EmailService and LoginResponse classes.
LoginServiceIntegratedTest - Class in services
 
LoginServiceIntegratedTest() - Constructor for class services.LoginServiceIntegratedTest
 
LoginServiceTest - Class in services
 
LoginServiceTest() - Constructor for class services.LoginServiceTest
 
loginTest() - Method in class controllers.LoginControllerTest
